introduce.name: generator
introduce.title: How Our AI Art Style Generator Works
introduce.label: How It Works
introduce.description: Transform your text prompts into unique, high-quality art in three simple steps. Our advanced AI models understand both content and style.

items.title: 1. Describe Your Vision
items.description: Write a text prompt describing what you want to see. Be as simple or as detailed as you like.

items.title: 2. Choose Your AI Art Style
items.description: Select from a vast library of styles‚Äîfrom classic painters to modern digital art‚Äîor upload your own.

items.title: 3. Generate & Refine
items.description: Our AI creates your masterpiece in seconds. Don't like it? Tweak the prompt or style and try again.

benefit.name: features
benefit.title: More Than Just a Generator
benefit.label: Core Features
benefit.description: Unlock a full suite of AI-powered tools designed to give you complete creative control over your artistic style.

items.title: AI Style Transfer
items.description: Apply the artistic style from any reference image to your own photos. Turn a selfie into a Picasso portrait instantly.

items.title: Intelligent Style Library
items.description: Explore hundreds of pre-trained AI art styles. Each style is an entity our AI understands deeply, ensuring authentic results.

items.title: AI Prompt Extractor
items.description: Love an image? Upload it, and our AI will analyze it to generate descriptive keywords and prompts you can use.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: Create Your First Masterpiece
usage.description: Follow this guide to see how easy it is to bring your imagination to life with our AI.

items.title: Start with a Text Prompt
items.description: Example: 'A majestic lion wearing a crown, sitting on a throne in a futuristic city'.

items.title: Select 'Cyberpunk' Style
items.description: Browse our style library and click on the 'Cyberpunk' preset to apply its neon and high-tech aesthetic.

items.title: Hit 'Generate'
items.description: Watch as the AI combines your prompt with the chosen style to create a unique piece of art.

items.title: Apply Style to Your Photo
items.description: Alternatively, upload your own photo and a style image (like a Van Gogh painting) to merge them.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about creating with AI art styles.

items.title: What is an AI art style?
items.description: An AI art style is a visual aesthetic that an artificial intelligence model has learned to recognize and replicate. It's more than a filter; the AI understands the core characteristics of an entity‚Äîlike Van Gogh's brushstrokes or Anime's line art‚Äîand applies them to a new image or prompt.

items.title: How does AI style transfer work?
items.description: AI style transfer uses a deep learning technique where two images are provided: a 'content' image (like your photo) and a 'style' reference image (like a painting). The AI then redraws the content image to match the texture, color palette, and patterns of the style reference.

items.title: Can I use the images I generate for commercial purposes?
items.description: This depends on the plan you choose. Our free plan is for personal use only. Our Pro plans grant you full ownership and commercial rights to the images you create, provided your input prompt and images do not infringe on existing copyrights.

items.title: Is my data and are my uploaded images safe?
items.description: Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your uploaded images are used solely for the generation process and are automatically deleted from our servers after 24 hours unless you choose to save them to your private gallery. We do not use your images for AI training.

items.title: What makes your AI art styles different from others?
items.description: Our focus is on entity-based style learning. Instead of just mimicking surface looks, our models are trained with contextual information about the artists, movements, and techniques, leading to more authentic and nuanced results. This provides a clear 'information gain' for both users and search engines.

items.title: What is a prompt extractor?
items.description: Our prompt extractor tool analyzes an existing image and generates a text description (a prompt) and relevant keywords that could be used to create a similar image. It's a great way to deconstruct an art style you admire and learn about prompt engineering.

cta.name: cta

cta.description: Join our community and start generating stunning, unique artwork today. Your next masterpiece is just a click away.
